title: Biden’s Plan for Student Loans Attracts Lawsuits, Scams and Confusion
description: As borrowers wait for the administration to unveil an application for loan forgiveness, they are wary of legal challenges and a proliferation of misinformation.
dc:creator: Katie Rogers
media:credit: Kenny Holston for The New York Times
media:description: The goal of President Biden’s student loan forgiveness program was to instantly improve the finances of millions of Americans. But the process has been chaotic.
